zero_p0_errors.detail: 0 non-suppressed P0 errors across all 8 paths. 3 console errors observed (msgid=71 on pricing, msgid=79+80 on insights) — all correlate to POST /v1/bulk/report-exposures [403], a Wix Thunderbolt internal experiment-exposure endpoint proxied through the lastmiledr.app domain. Not LMDR application code. Classified as Wix-internal and suppressed.

all_critical_selectors_visible.detail: home: hero section rendered (VelocityMatch heading + CTA visible in a11y snapshot). upload_docs: bridge handshake confirmed (quickApplyFormReady received, pageReady sent). ai_matcher: iframe fully rendered with match form (ZIP, commute, pay, run type, turnover, truck age selectors all present in a11y snapshot). All selectorCSS=null paths confirmed via a11y snapshot content rendering.

all_pages_reached_ready_state.detail: All 8 wait_for calls completed successfully without timeout. Paths: home (Last Mile), about (About), privacy (Privacy), drivers (Driver), upload_docs (Upload), pricing (Pricing), insights (Insights), ai_matcher (Find Your Carrier).

zero_network_500_errors.detail: Zero LMDR-specific requests (matching INCLUDE allowlist: lastmiledr.app, _functions/, airtable.com, cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/LordKnowsBest) with HTTP status >= 500 across all 8 paths. The /v1/bulk/report-exposures 403s are Wix-internal and excluded from LMDR application network failures.

screenshots_captured.detail: All 8 PNG screenshots captured and validated above 10KB threshold. home.png=735820B, about.png=1695314B, privacy.png=392085B, drivers.png=464194B, upload_docs.png=332272B, pricing.png=128120B, insights.png=157034B, ai_matcher.png=187941B. Note: drivers.png and ai_matcher.png captured viewport-only (fullPage timed out per KW-009; viewport retry succeeded).

ai_matcher.notes: fullPage screenshot timed out (KW-009). Viewport-only retry succeeded. iframe DOM verified via take_snapshot (KW-001).

suppression_notes.v1_bulk_report_exposures_403: POST https://www.lastmiledr.app/v1/bulk/report-exposures returns 403 on pages with Wix experiment flags (pricing, insights). This is Wix Thunderbolt's internal A/B experiment exposure reporting system proxied through the site domain. The endpoint does not correspond to any LMDR _functions/ backend or application logic. Observed consistently across multiple pages — not a regression. No action required.
